short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easy and free time tracking of tasks in the browser running in the background.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple Time Tracker - application for easy and FREE (no subscription, no credit card required) time tracking of tasks in the browser running in the background.

TrackTime is a clean and intuitive Chrome extension that allows you to easily track time spent on tasks right in your browser. With its simple yet powerful timer interface, you can time multiple tasks simultaneously and see where your time went each day.

The extension runs silently in the background, so you can start timing tasks with a single click and stop them just as easily when you are done. The main pop-up interface shows all running timers along with their elapsed time and task name. You can edit timer names or quickly delete timers as needed.

TrackTime takes the headache out of manually tracking your time and gives you insight into where your hours are actually spent. Give it a try for a more productive you!

Export data in CSV or JSON format.
